about_the_game:
"Clandestine: The Hidden Truth" a psychological horror adventure that blurs the lines between reality and nightmare.

Uncover the Truth:
You are a private investigator hired to delve into the mysteries of a gruesome family murder. Little do you know, the answers are hidden within the confines of your own fractured mind.

Gameplay
alter your surroundings and reveal hidden clues. Piece together the shattered puzzle of your memories, each picture bringing you closer to the disturbing truth.



Explore a House of Shadows:
Roam through a hauntingly atmospheric house, solve puzzles, and unlock the secrets that lead to a mysterious basement. But beware, not all doors are meant to be opened.



Psychological Terrors Await:
Immerse yourself in an eerie environment where reality is fluid, and your own sanity is put to the test. Uncover unsettling memories, and face the consequences of a past shrouded in darkness.

Clandestine is not just a game; it's a descent into the depths of your own subconscious. Are you ready to confront the horrors hidden within? Enter the darkness on Steam and discover the secrets that lie beneath the surface.

content_descriptors.notes: This video game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better

short_description: "Clandestine: The Hidden Truth" is a first-person psychological horror game. Investigate a family homicide, manipulate reality with polaroids, and solve puzzles to unveil chilling secrets hidden within this enigmatic home of horrors. Will you come back unscathed?
